c:complexType.name: MetricPointChartCommonOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class for the Metric Line/Dot family charts.

c:property.name: visualRoles
c:property.c:documentation: The visual roles common to the metric point chart types.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points object contains style definitions for various visual elements of the chart.

c:complexType.name: MetricPointCommonVisualRoles
c:complexType.c:documentation: The visual roles common to the metric point plots.

c:property.name: color
c:property.c:documentation:
The color visual role controls the color of the dots and lines of the visual elements.
The color visual role automatically binds to every discrete dimension, or a single continuous dimension, whose name has the color prefix or, if none exists, the dimensions of the "series" role.
The color visual role is discrete or continuous.
The default value type of dimensions bound to it is Number.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:property.name: size
c:property.c:documentation:
The size visual role controls the size of the dots of the visual elements, and, as such, it is only represented if dots are visible.
The size visual role automatically binds to every dimension whose name has the size prefix.
The size visual role is continuous and optional.
The default value type of the dimension bound to it is Number.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:property.name: x
c:property.c:documentation:
The x visual role controls the base position of the "point" visual element.
The x visual role automatically binds to a single dimension whose name has the x prefix.
The x visual role is continuous and required.
The default value type of the dimension bound to it depends on the value of the chart option . If it is true it is Date, otherwise, it is Number.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:property.name: y
c:property.c:documentation:
The y visual role controls the orthogonal position of the "point" visual element.
The y visual role automatically binds to a single dimension whose name has the y prefix.
The y visual role is continuous and required.
The default value type of the dimension bound to it is Number.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:complexType.name: MetricPointCommonExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation: The extension points common to the metric point plots.

c:complexType.name: MetricPointPlotCommonOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class of the metric point plots.

c:property.name: trend
c:property.c:documentation:
Contains the plot's trending options.
Besides the property concatenation way of specifying this property and its sub-properties, this option may also be specified as a plain JSON object.
